Author: donout_disturb
Text: Yeah I agree... You never actually get to your "goal weight" and be happy, once you're there you just want to go lower and lower. I had like 3 goal weights since this mess started... Am I happy now? No. I have a new goal weight and I keep telling myself that when I'll get there I'll be happy. What a lie.

Author: lose_lose_lose
Text: It's good that you're doing so well in school, but there's a really slim chance you'l be happy when you reach your goal weight. So far I don't know anyone who has been
